title: Interaction Element Visible Event Data
description: Data payload for the interaction.element_visible event. Fired when a tracked element becomes visible in the viewport (impression tracking).

elementId.description: The HTML id attribute of the visible element.

elementClass.description: The CSS class(es) of the visible element.

elementTag.description: The HTML tag name of the visible element.

visiblePercentage.description: The percentage of the element visible in the viewport.

dwellTime.description: The duration the element was visible in seconds.

region.description: The page region where the element is located, e.g. header, sidebar, footer.
